text: Date: 2025-09-03 Theme: Dashboard Clarity / Post-Onboarding Review Participants: Rachel Kim (CSM), Thomas Hill (PM), Linda Mora (Ops Director), Ethan Cole (Systems Analyst) Transcript Rachel (CSM): Hi Linda, thanks for joining. Date: I wanted to check in after your teamâ€™s onboarding completion last month â€” how are things looking? Date: Linda (Customer): Much better overall. Date: Jamie (Customer): Not major ones â€” weâ€™d just like more visibility into which departments are most active. Date: Rachel: Thatâ€™s coming in the next analytics release.
